Html:
But I don't like tags:
1.<fo:inline border-style="solid" border-width="0.25pt" padding="2pt 3pt 1pt 3pt">X</fo:inline>
X must be in the frame, but no frame
  1. <fo:leader leader-length="18.5cm" border-width="0.25pt" border-bottom-style="dotted" />
    There should be a dotted line, but it is also there in PDF.
Tell me, please what could be the problem.
